Tempest.farmingTips: Buried City Hospital during Night Raid has the most containers. Village area on Blue Gate Night Raid also good. Commercial desk drawers in Research & Admin on Dam.

Wolfpack.farmingTips: Drops commonly during any Night Raid from residential containers.

Volcano.farmingTips: Orange breachable Server Racks on top floor of Hidden Bunker. Also drops from First Wave Caches during Hurricane.
